description.english: Complete the first three tutorial levels.
description.french: Complètez les premier trois niveaux tutoriels.
description.schinese: 完成前三个教程关卡。
description.russian: Пройти первые три уровня обучения.
description.brazilian: Conclua os três primeiros níveis do tutorial.

displayName.english: Do It Again, I Wasn't Looking!
displayName.brazilian: Faça de novo, eu não estava olhando!

description.english: Trick an enemy into falling out of the map.
description.french: Amenez un ennemi à faire tomber hors de la niveau.
description.schinese: 诱骗敌人掉出地图。
description.russian: Заставить врага упасть за пределы карты.
description.brazilian: Engane um inimigo e faça-o cair do mapa.

description.english: Complete the "Watch Your Step" challenge on the "Snapshots" level by not falling.
description.french: Complétez le défi « Fais gaffe » sur le niveau « Des aperçus » par ne pas tomber.
description.schinese: 完成“瞬闪”关卡的“当心脚下”挑战，不要跌倒。
description.russian: Пройти испытание "Смотрите под ноги" на уровне "Вспышки", не упав.
description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio "Cuidado onde pisa" no nível "Clarão instantâneo" sem cair.

description.english: Cause Spooky to slide by stunning him on some ice.
description.french: Provoquez L'Effrayant de glisser par l'assommer sur la glace.
description.schinese: 将斯波奇击晕在冰上，使其滑行。
description.russian: Заставить жутика скользить, оглушив его на льду.
description.brazilian: Faça o Spooky deslizar atordoando-o no gelo.

displayName.english: Don't Do the Crime If You Can't Do the Time!
displayName.french: Ne commettes pas le crime si tu ne peux pas purger la peine !
displayName.brazilian: Não cometa o crime se não puder cumprir a pena!

description.english: Trap seven enemies in cages in a single level.
description.french: Piégez sept ennemis en cages dans un seul niveau.
description.schinese: 在单个关卡中用笼子困住七名敌人。
description.russian: Посадить семь врагов в клетки на одном уровне.
description.brazilian: Prenda sete inimigos em jaulas em um único nível.

description.english: Defeat two different types of enemies with one Crowbar swing.
description.french: Vaincrez deux types différents des ennemis avec un seul mouvement de balancier avec un pied-de-biche.
description.schinese: 挥动一次撬棍击败两种不同类型的敌人。
description.russian: Победить двух врагов разного типа одним ударом лома.
description.brazilian: Derrote dois tipos diferentes de inimigos com um golpe de pé de cabra.

description.english: Open a Lock with a Key purchased from Pedro's Shop.
description.french: Ouvrez un verrou avec une clé acheteé du magasin de Pedro.
description.schinese: 用从佩德罗的商店购买的钥匙打开一把锁。
description.russian: Открыть замок с помощью ключа из магазина Педро.
description.brazilian: Abra uma Fechadura com uma Chave comprada na Loja do Pedro.

description.english: Dig out a Spawner before it spawns any enemies.
description.french: Déterrez un Générateur d'ennemis avant qu'il découle des ennemis.
description.schinese: 在生成器生成任何敌人之前将其挖出。
description.russian: Выкопать генератор, пока он не создал врагов.
description.brazilian: Desenterre um Gerador antes que ele gere inimigos.

description.english: Gather 70 Treats worth of Toys on a bonus level.
description.french: Remassez 70 friandises de valoir de jouets dans un seul niveau bonus.
description.schinese: 在单个奖励关卡中收集价值 70 个点心的玩具。
description.russian: Добыть игрушки стоимостью в 70 лакомств на одном бонусном уровне.
description.brazilian: Colecione Brinquedos no valor de 70 Guloseimas em um único nível bônus.

description.english: Use a pair of Cleats to move carefully on a frozen enemy.
description.french: Utilisez une paire de chaussures à crampons pour bouger avec prudence sur un ennemi gelé.
description.schinese: 使用一双钉鞋小心地在被冰冻的敌人身上移动。
description.russian: Использовать бутсы для осторожного перемещения по замороженному врагу.
description.brazilian: Use um par de Sapatos com Trava para se mover com cuidado sobre um inimigo congelado.

description.english: Override a map's music selection with a Cassette.
description.french: Forcez la sélection de musique de la carte avec une cassette.
description.schinese: 使用磁带覆盖一张地图的音乐选择。
description.russian: Изменить выбор музыки на карте с помощью кассеты.
description.brazilian: Substitua a seleção de músicas de um mapa por uma Fita Cassete.

displayName.french: Ça combien vingt-cinq cents, s'il vous plaît !
displayName.brazilian: São vinte e cinco centavos, por favor!

description.english: Buy something from Pedro's Shop.
description.french: Achetez quelque chose du magasin de Pedro.
description.schinese: 从佩德罗的商店购物。
description.russian: Купить что-нибудь в магазине Педро.
description.brazilian: Compre algo na Loja do Pedro.

description.english: Dig up a buired Collectable.
description.french: Déterrez un objet de collection enterré.
description.schinese: 挖出一件埋藏的收藏品。
description.russian: Выкопать коллекционный предмет.
description.brazilian: Desenterre um Colecionável enterrado.

displayName.schinese: 他只是……气势汹汹地站在那里！
displayName.russian: Он просто стоит... с грозным видом!
displayName.brazilian: Ele está parado ali... Com ar ameaçador!

description.english: Confuse a Ketchup Grandfather and then force him into a hole.
description.french: Confondez un grand-père ketchup et forcez-le à entrer dans un trou.
description.schinese: 迷惑番茄酱爷爷，然后迫使他进入洞里。
description.russian: Сбить с толку кетчупного дедулю и заставить его упасть в яму.
description.brazilian: Confunda um Vovô do Ketchup e o force a entrar em um buraco.

displayName.french: Il n'y pas endroit comme chez moi !
displayName.schinese: 没有比家更美好的地方！
displayName.brazilian: Não há lugar como o nosso lar!

description.english: Rescue all Boggies at once on a level proposing a "Rescue Party" challenge.
description.french: Sauvez tous les boggies en même temps dans un niveau qui propose un défi « Fête du sauvetage ».
description.schinese: 在提供“团队救援”挑战的关卡中一次营救所有的波吉。
description.russian: Спасти всех богги сразу на уровне с испытанием "Спасательный отряд".
description.brazilian: Resgate todos os Boggies de uma vez em uma fase que propõe um desafio de "Grupo de Resgate".

description.english: Trap an enemy in a hole right after they reappear.
description.french: Piégez un ennemi dans un trou après qu'il réapparaisse tout de suite.
description.schinese: 当敌人再次出现后，立即将其困在洞中。
description.russian: Поместить врага в яму сразу после его повторного появления.
description.brazilian: Prenda um inimigo em um buraco logo após ele reaparecer.

description.english: Block a Jumping Boggie from relocating without using a Freezphere.
description.french: Empêchez un boggie sauteur de se déplacer sans utiliser de sphère à géler.
description.schinese: 在不使用冷冻球的情况下阻止跳跃波吉移动。
description.russian: Помешать прыгучему богги переместиться, не используя морозосферу.
description.brazilian: Impeça um Boggie Saltitante de se mover sem usar uma Esfera de Congelamento.

displayName.english: You Got Your Toothpaste in My Peanut Butter!
displayName.french: Tu as mis ton dentifrice dans mon beurre de cacahuète !
displayName.schinese: 你把牙膏弄到我的花生酱里了！
displayName.russian: Кто выдавил зубную пасту в мое арахисовое масло?!
displayName.brazilian: Você despejou sua pasta de dente na minha pasta de amendoim!

description.english: Use an Inverter to cause a Boggie to rescue itself.
description.french: Utilisez un retourneur pour forcer un boggie de se sauver au porte de borf.
description.schinese: 使用反转器让一个波吉自救。
description.russian: Заставить богги спастись самостоятельно с помощью инвертора.
description.brazilian: Use um Inversor para fazer com que um Boggie se resgate.

displayName.brazilian: Essa é por conta da casa!

description.english: Get a free item from Pedro's Shop.
description.french: Obtenez quelque chose gratuit du magasin de Pedro.
description.schinese: 从佩德罗的商店获得一件免费物品。
description.russian: Получить бесплатный предмет в магазине Педро.
description.brazilian: Ganhe um item grátis na Loja do Pedro.

description.english: Defeat five enemies with a single Minecart push.
description.french: Poussez un wagonnet pour vaincre cinq ennemis.
description.schinese: 推动一次矿车击败五名敌人。
description.russian: Победить пять врагов одним толчком вагонетки.
description.brazilian: Derrote cinco inimigos com um único empurrão de Carrinho de Mina.

displayName.french: Le ciel a accouché un enfant !

description.english: Build a Ladder higher than nine tiles.
description.french: Bâtissez une échelle plus haute que neuf carreaux.
description.schinese: 搭建一个高于九格的梯子。
description.russian: Построить лестницу выше девяти клеток.
description.brazilian: Construa uma escada com mais de nove peças de altura.

description.english: Defeat an enemy by dropping an Apple Pie on them.
description.french: Vaincrez un ennemi par faire tomber une tarte aux pommes.
description.schinese: 向敌人投掷苹果派来击败敌人。
description.russian: Победить врага, сбросив на него яблочный пирог.
description.brazilian: Derrote um inimigo jogando uma Torta de Maçã nele.

displayName.french: Ce n'est pas grave, prends ton temps !

description.english: Finish the final Park level.
description.french: Finissez le dernier niveau du parc.
description.schinese: 完成公园的最后一关。
description.russian: Пройти последний уровень парка.
description.brazilian: Conclua a fase final do Parque.

displayName.english: Guess It's Time to Take It Up a Notch!
displayName.french: On devine que c'est le temps de monter d'un cran !
displayName.schinese: 我想是时候更上一层楼了！
displayName.brazilian: Acho que é hora de levar isso para o próximo patamar!

description.english: Finish the final Junkyard level.
description.french: Finissez le dernier niveau de la casse.
description.schinese: 完成垃圾场的最后一关。
description.russian: Пройти последний уровень свалки.
description.brazilian: Conclua a fase final do Ferro-velho.

description.english: Stop a fall through Bad Ground using Scaffolding.
description.french: Empêchez une chute à travers le mauvais sol avec l'échafaudage.
description.schinese: 使用脚手架来防止从不良地面坠落。
description.russian: Не провалиться сквозь опасную землю благодаря лесам.
description.brazilian: Impede uma queda em Terreno Ruim usando Andaime.

displayName.english: Bring That Ladder Back This Instant!
displayName.french: Ramenez cette échelle tout de suite !
displayName.brazilian: Traga essa escada de volta imediatamente!

description.english: Swing off of a Flicker Ladder just before it times out.
description.french: Descendrez à une échelle à vaciller juste avant qu'elle disparaisse.
description.schinese: 在闪烁梯子即将超时前从梯子上跳下。
description.russian: Спрыгнуть с мерцающей лестницы в последний момент.
description.brazilian: Saia de uma Escada Piscante pouco antes do tempo acabar.

description.english: Finish the final Sewer level.
description.french: Finissez le dernier niveau des égouts.
description.schinese: 完成下水道的最后一关。
description.russian: Пройти последний уровень канализации.
description.brazilian: Conclua a fase final do Esgoto.

displayName.english: It Was Him, He Did It!
displayName.brazilian: Foi ele, ele que fez isso!

description.english: Distract an enemy with a Decoy.
description.french: Distrayez un ennemi avec un leurre.
description.schinese: 使用诱饵分散敌人的注意力。
description.russian: Отвлечь врага с помощью приманки.
description.brazilian: Distraia um inimigo com um Chamariz.

displayName.english: A Bit More Complicated Than That!
displayName.french: Un peu plus compliqué que ça !
displayName.brazilian: Um pouco mais complicado que isso!

description.english: Finish the final Abandoned Factory level.
description.french: Finissez le dernier niveau de l'usine abandonnée.
description.schinese: 完成废弃工厂的最后一关。
description.russian: Пройти последний уровень заброшенной фабрики.
description.brazilian: Conclua a fase final da Fábrica Abandonada.

description.english: Save yourself from falling into Muck by grabbing onto Bars.
description.french: Sauvez-vous de tomber en boue par saisir une barre de cage à écureuil.
description.schinese: 抓住栏杆，避免掉进堆肥。
description.russian: Спастись от падения в грязь, схватившись за перила.
description.brazilian: Evite cair na Lama agarrando-se às Barras.

displayName.english: I Told You He Was Onto Us!
displayName.french: Je te disais qu'il nous aurait découverts !
displayName.brazilian: Eu avisei que ele estava de olho na gente!

description.english: Avoid all enemy alerts in a level proposing a "Did You Hear That?" challenge.
description.french: Évitez toutes les alertes d'ennemi dans un niveau qui propose un défi « Vous avez entendu ça ? ».
description.schinese: 在提供“你听到了吗？”挑战的关卡中避免惊动所有敌人。
description.russian: Избежать все вражеские сигнализации на уровне с испытанием "Вы это слышали?".
description.brazilian: Evite todos os alertas de inimigos em uma fase que propõe um desafio de "Você ouviu isso?".

description.english: Defeat Joseph Muell and finish the final Operations Hive level.
description.french: Vaincrez Joseph Muell et finissez le dernier niveau de la ruche des opérations.
description.schinese: 击败约瑟夫·穆埃尔，完成蜂巢行动的最后一关。
description.russian: Победить Джозефа Мюэлла и пройти последний уровень оперативного улья.
description.brazilian: Derrote Joseph Muell e conclua a fase final das Operações Colmeia.

description.english: Finish the final Cloud level and earn your invitation.
description.french: Finissez tous les niveaux des nuages et gagner votre invitation.
description.schinese: 完成所有云朵关卡并获得邀请。
description.russian: Пройти все облачные уровни и заработать приглашение.
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as fases da Nuvem e ganhe seu convite.

displayName.english: I'm So Cold That I'm Shivering!
displayName.french: Je suis si froid que je frissonne !
displayName.brazilian: Estou com tanto frio que estou tremendo!

description.english: Stack 30 or more seconds of Freezphere time.
description.french: Empilez 30 ou plus de seconds du temps de sphère à geler.
description.schinese: 积累 30 秒或更久的冷冻球时间。
description.russian: Накопить не менее 30 секунд действия морозосферы.
description.brazilian: Acumule 30 segundos ou mais tempo na Esfera de Congelamento.

displayName.english: Each Work of Art Is Like a Child...
displayName.french: Chaque pièce d'art est comme un enfant…
displayName.schinese: 每件艺术品都是作者的宝宝……
displayName.brazilian: Cada obra de arte é como uma criança...

description.english: Rescue all Boggies on the "Those Were the Days" secret level.
description.french: Sauvez tous les boggies sur le niveau « C'était à l'époque ».
description.schinese: 在“想当年”秘密关卡中营救所有波吉。
description.russian: Спасти всех богги на секретном уровне "Старые добрые времена".
description.brazilian: Resgate todos os Boggies na fase secreta "Eram outros tempos".

description.english: Summon Spooky with a Curse purchased from Pedro's Shop.
description.french: Appelez L'Effrayant avec un malédiction acheté du magasin de Pedro.
description.schinese: 用从佩德罗的商店购买的诅咒召唤斯波奇。
description.russian: Призвать жутика с помощью проклятия из магазина Педро.
description.brazilian: Invoque o Spooky com uma Maldição comprada na Loja do Pedro.

description.english: Achieve 100% completion in a single save slot.
description.french: Atteignez 100 % complétion dans un seul profil.
description.schinese: 在单个存档中达到 100% 完成度。
description.russian: Пройти игру на 100% в одной ячейке сохранения.
description.brazilian: Alcance 100% de conclusão em um único espaço de salvamento.

description.english: Mine out a Mega Treat from some rock with a Pickaxe.
description.french: Exploitez un mega friandise de la roche avec une pioche.
description.schinese: 用镐从岩石中挖出超级点心。
description.russian: Добыть мегалакомство из камня с помощью кирки.
description.brazilian: Extraia uma Megaguloseimas de uma pedra com uma Picareta.

displayName.english: I'll Take It Easy When I'm Dead!
displayName.french: Je me la coulerai la douce quand je suis mort !

description.english: Hold ten Extra Lives at once.
description.french: Tenez dix jetons de vie à la même fois.
description.schinese: 同时保有十条额外生命。
description.russian: Накопить десять дополнительных жизней.
description.brazilian: Retenha dez Vidas Extras de uma só vez.

description.english: Beat the Par Time of a level by 30 or more seconds.
description.french: Passez un Par Time par 30 ou plus secondes.
description.schinese: 以比标准时间少 30 秒或以上的纪录通过一关。
description.russian: Пройти уровень как минимум на 30 секунд раньше базового времени.
description.brazilian: Complete um nível em 30 segundos ou menos que o Tempo Ideal.

description.english: Collect all of the Considerable Grandfather figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines de Considerable Grandfather.
description.schinese: 收集所有了不起爷爷雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки почтенного дедули.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Vovô Notável.

description.english: Collect all of the Boggie figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines de boggie.
description.schinese: 收集所有波吉雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки богги.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Boggie.

displayName.english: Does This Look Unsure to You?
displayName.schinese: 你觉得这像是不确定的样子吗？

description.english: Collect all of the Moleman figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines d'homme-taupe.
description.schinese: 收集所有鼹鼠人雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки человека-крота.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Homem-Toupeira.

displayName.brazilian: Ele gosta da sua colher de pau!

description.english: Collect all of the Mean Boggie figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines de boggie méchant.
description.schinese: 收集所有刻薄波吉雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки злого богги.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Boggie Malvado.

description.english: Collect all of the Spooky figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines de l'Effrayant.
description.schinese: 收集所有斯波奇雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки жутика.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Spooky.

displayName.french: Qu'est-ce que vous prenez, les gars ?

description.english: Collect all of the Ketchup Grandfather figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines de grand-père ketchup.
description.schinese: 收集所有番茄酱爷爷雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки кетчупного дедули.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Vovô do Ketchup.

displayName.french: Ce n'est pas un animal de compagnie ça !
displayName.brazilian: Não é um bicho de estimação!

description.english: Collect all of the Rat figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines de rat.
description.schinese: 收集所有老鼠雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки крысы.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas do Rato.

description.english: Collect all of the Mecha Bee figurines.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les figurines d'abeulle mécha.
description.schinese: 收集所有机甲蜜蜂雕像。
description.russian: Собрать все фигурки мехапчелы.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as estatuetas da Abelha Mecha.

displayName.english: Can You Believe They Only Had One in Stock?

description.english: Unlock the Golden Shovel.
Defeat a Mecha Bee with a hole that you dug.

displayName.english: I'm Going to the Snack Bar!

description.english: On the level "Ambush", pass round 8.
Rescue an Invisiboggie revealed by a Compass.
